name: Listened to Dear Internet / Greetings, Adventurers! Cross Over Bonus Episode Extravaganza

content.html:
Dear Internet, We have a very special event for you. A cross over with Greetings Adventurers! We are joined by the usual Dear Internet crew plus Mike Bachmann! This is an extremely fun dnd flavored dear internet. Thank you for reading this, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
